Material used.Description: Artificial constructs were created and transfected into HEK293 cells for analysis.

Readout description.Molecular Effect: No significant effect on protein expression or function
Readout description.Result Description: G309D showed normal protein expression and kinase activity compared to wild-type.

Readout description.Molecular Effect: Reduced protein expression and functional activity
Readout description.Result Description: L347P led to 60-70% reduction in protein expression and 50-60% loss of kinase activity.

Biological replicates.Description: Experiments were repeated in three biological replicates.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was analyzed in triplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type PINK1 was used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Empty vector was used as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: t-test and ANOVA were used for statistical analysis.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Protein expression ≥ 80% and kinase activity ≥ 80% of wild-type.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Protein expression < 50% or kinase activity < 50% of wild-type.
